play.db.jpa

Class GenericModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.db.jpa.JPABase
      • play.db.jpa.GenericModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Model
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JPASupport, Model

    @MappedSuperclass
public class GenericModel
extends JPABase
    A super class for JPA entities
